text: Horror is the second studio album by American deathcore band With Blood Comes Cleansing. The album was released on January 22, 2008. ==Track listing== # "Intro" — 0:36 # "Hematidrosis" — 3:10 # "Lash Upon Lash" — 2:33 # "Forsaken" — 2:35 # "Filthy Stains" — 2:47 # "The Suffering" — 2:52 # "Blood and Fire" — 2:47 # "Abaddon's Horde" — 3:04 # "Horror" — 2:19 # "Carnivorous Consumption" — 3:41 # "Damnation" — 2:17 # "Eternal Reign" — 2:27 ==References== Category:2008 albums
title: Horror (album)
